coded_answer.p: I am very happy to answer your letter, which I received this morning. I am very exitingexcitingexcited withby the wonderful news.
Well, I startam starting to make a plan for my traveltrip, and the only time I have is onin July because I will be finishhave finished my course of languagelanguage course at St Jame's School.
About accomodationaccommodation I would prefer a cabinscabin, because I suffer from alergicallergicallergies, and I think a tendtent, would be notnot be very suitable for my health.

I am very happy to have the opportunity to do some sports. I'm very good inat swimming and surfing. SwimingSwimming I won last summersummer'sI won last summer's swimming competition in the school, although. Although I'm not very good at surfing I like it, and I always practispractise inon my holidays every year.
I would like to know if it is necesarynecessary for me to bring some money, orand if we will have time to visit the City, about. About the clothes, do I have to bring some winter clothes?
ImI'm very greatfulgrateful to hearinghear from you.
I was very happy to receive your letter.
It's wonderful that you are going to listenattend a pop concert. I'm sure you will be enjoy it. You asked me to tell you about my experience to helphelping inat the concencertconcert last week.

Well, let me tell you, first of all I was very nervous you. You know it was my first time inat such an event. Well, Kim, remember if they askedask you to help go you. You will see how wonderful an experience it is.

Give my regards to your boyfriend.
